data.title: Innovation Center
data.text:
The Kelly Johnson Joint All-Domain Innovation Center was established to create a partnership between the Michigan National Guard, industry, DoD research agencies, and academia.

Goals

Promote collaboration of joint service and industry technologies

Support major exercise alignment with Michigan senior leader objectives

Solve problems and apply technology solutions in our innovation lab

Establish a Northern National Guard innovation center tied to the Hap Arnold Innovation Center in California

Enable service members to contribute in solving crucial needs

Leverage Michigan's unique industry and manufacturing capability in engineering, innovation, research and development, and testing

Collaborate and bridge key research labs focus on emerging technologies, robotics, artificial intelligence, machine learning, autonomy, and entrepreneurship
